description: Explore the wild with this guide to the trails and backcountry routes of Strathcona Park in central Vancouver Island. Hike the Flower Ridge trail, camp at Marble Meadows, ski the Comox Range traverse, hike up Elkhorn Mountain South, and explore Della Falls. This guide includes detailed descriptions, overviews, topos, full colour photos, difficulty ratings, bush grades and the history of the area.
name: Exploring Strathcona Park
